name: Laser Kart
description:
The incredible sequel to LASER CAT, now featuring a lot more roads! Drift and swerve through 2 stages packed to the brim with hostile vehicles and their bullets.

Music by Valentine

Known issue: Occasionally, the game hangs up and doesn't progress, requiring a restart. I'll be working on providing a patch for that.

If you're lagging in the browser, please download the windows version.

Controls on the main menu.

Made in 9 days for Bullet Hell Jam 2022.
